attributes.action: Specialist officers for dog fighting & stricter laws
attributes.additional_details:
Dog Fighting is a cruel sport in which two dogs are pitted  against each other to kill each other to death.
While spectators gamble and place bets on a "winning" dog

From cruel training including taunting, starving, being injected with steroids

Dogs who do not want to fight or have lost fights are used as Bait dogs who are often stolen dogs or dogs who have been advertised online as" free to good home"

The government needs to take stronger action such as specialist officers who handle dog fighting.

Stricter punishments on those who organize and attend and breed.

A Lifetime ban on keeping any animal.
